snippet.title: Kaizo Mario Galaxy Release Trailer (V1.2 is out!)
snippet.description:
Kaizo Mario Galaxy will be a full game (120 star) hack that is centered around making Super Mario Galaxy more challenging, and more interesting!

Thank you to Collin Hughes for putting this trailer together for me: https://www.youtube.com/c/CollinHughes

Buoy Base Remix by Video Game Remixes (VGR) Original here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=55BR7F4JcFQ

DOWNLOAD V1.2: http://www.mediafire.com/file/jati6c366eh2pu5/Kaizo_Mario_Galaxy_V1.2.zip/file

If you already have V1.1 and just want to update directly, here is the patch by itself: http://www.mediafire.com/file/qg3di6f54i984mg/KMG_Patch_V1.2.zip/file

(If you somehow have v1.0 still, please download the full v1.2)

To play on Dolphin: https://github.com/Uupo03/Kaizo-Mario-Galaxy-Iso-Builder/releases
